data.quote: All Birds find shelter during rain. But Eagle avoids rain by flying above clouds.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Be active! Take on responsibility! Work for the things you believe in. If you do not, you are surrendering your fate to others.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Thinking is the capital, Enterprise is the way, Hard Work is the solution.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Climbing to the top demands strength, whether it is to the top of Mount Everest or to the top of your career.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Unless we stands up to the world, no one will respect us. In this world, fear has no place. Only strength respects strength.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Man needs difficulties in life because they are necessary to enjoy the success.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: No matter what is the environment around you, it is always possible to maintain brand of integrity.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: One best book is equal to hundred good friends, but one good friend is equal to a library.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Your best teacher is your last mistake.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Don’t read success stories, you will only get message. Read failure stories, you will get some ideas to get success.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: I will work and sweat for a great vision.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to those who dream and work.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: If you fail, never give up because F.A.I.L. means “First Attempt In Learning”. End is not the end, if fact E.N.D. means “Effort Never Dies.” If you get No as an answer, remember N.O. means “Next Opportunity”, So let’s be positive.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: You cannot change your future, but, you can change your habits, and surely your habits will change your future.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: The best brains of the nations may be found on the last benches of the classrooms.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: I'm not a handsome guy, but I can give my hand to someone who needs help. Beauty is in the heart, not in the face.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my definition to succeed is strong enough.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: All of us do not have equal talent. But, all of us have an equal opportunity to develop our talents.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Don’t take rest after your first victory because if you fail in second, more lips are waiting to say that your first victory was just luck.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam
